CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Build',IMAGE("/resource/I8__build","Build",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Abandoned',IMAGE("/resource/I8__abandon","Abandoned",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Review',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Status/review.png","Review",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Scheduled',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Schedule","Scheduled",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'SOE Completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__ImpCompleted","Completed",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Closed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Iceflow/Closed.png","Closed",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Freeze',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Status/freeze.png","Freeze",20,20),
IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Suspended',IMAGE("/resource/I8__suspend","Suspended",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Imp Completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Complete","ImpCompleted",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'BO In Progress',IMAGE("/resource/I8__BOInProgress","BO In Progress",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'SOE BO completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__SOEBOCompleted","SOE BO Completed",25,25), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'BO Completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__BOCompleted","BO Completed",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Imp In Progress',IMAGE("/resource/I8__InProgress","InProgress",20,20),null) ))))))))))))
CustomField.label: State
